subtitle.translate: Read this before crafting any ships

description: /c/__**Small Ships Tutorial**__/c/

Before you craft your first ship, it is important that you know how to control it. These ships do not work the same way as a vanilla boat, so you must learn the basic controls. Don't worry, it won't be too hard.

> ||+|| Also important to note that you CANNOT pick up ships again like with boats. Once a ship is placed, it won't leave the water, so make sure you place it in a body of water connected to the ocean. ||+||
/2/__**Ship Controls**__/2/

Press **/e/[R]/e/** on your keyboard to __set the sail.__ This is much like setting a car to the drive position in real life in that it will start to move forward slowly. --Pressing the key again-- will __retract the sail__ and cause the ship to slow to a stop.
Moving forward and backward (**/e/[W]/e/** and **/e/[S]/e/** on your keyboard by default) will __control the speed__ of your ship which you can see by how big the sail is getting.
Turning left and right is the same as with a normal boat and with normal movement (**/e/[A]/e/** and **/e/[D]/e/** by default)

Finally, you can __make entities ride the ship__ much like a normal boat. You can have 4 to 10 other players or mobs riding with you, depending on the type of ship. To dismount them, you just have to --/e/right-click/e/-- them. Much easier than a normal boat.
**__/2/Ship Customization/2/__**
--/e/Right-click/e/-- the ship with a dye to color the sails
--/e/Right-click/e/-- the ship with a nametag to name the ship
**__/2/Repairing and Docking/2/__**
To repair the damage on your ship, have /6/wooden planks/6/ somewhere in your inventory and then --/e/right-click/e/-- the ship with /7/iron nuggets/7/ in your hand.
Much like horses and other mobs, you can leash a ship with a lead to pull it around and tie it down to a fence post to dock it.
__**Mod Page explanation:**__
> Place the ship far away from you, into water. They need space to spawn.
> Use Right Click to sit in the ship.
> Whilesitting in the Ship:
> Press "R" to open/close the Ships Sail.
> Or Press "W" to increase and "S" to decrease the Sail.
> In Thrid Person View with F5 , scroll with you Mousewheel to change the distance of the View.
> To dismount a entity from the ship, right-click the entity.
> To open the Inventory outside of the ship,  use crouch+right-click on the ship.
